spawn_agibot.description: Spawn a new AGIBot instance to handle a specific task asynchronously. Useful for complex task decomposition and parallel execution.

task_description.description: Description of the task for the new AGIBot instance

agent_id.description: Custom agent ID (optional, will auto-generate if not provided). Must match format 'agent_XXX' where XXX is a 3-digit number

output_directory.description: Directory where the new AGIBot should save its output (optional, uses parent's if not provided)

api_key.description: API key for the new instance (optional, will use current if not provided)

model.description: Model name for the new instance (optional, will use current if not provided)

max_loops.description: Maximum execution loops for the new instance (default: 25)

shared_workspace.description: Whether to share parent's workspace directory (default: true)

wait_for_completion.description: Whether to wait for completion before returning (default: false)

streaming.description: Whether to use streaming output (default: false for python interface)

wait_for_agibot_spawns.description: Wait for spawned AGIBot tasks to complete and get their status.

task_ids.description: List of specific task IDs to wait for (will wait for all active if not provided)

check_interval.description: Interval in seconds between status checks (default: 5)

max_wait_time.description: Maximum time to wait in seconds (default: 3600)

send_message_to_agent.description: Send a direct message to a specific agent for communication between agents.

receiver_id.description: Target agent ID to send message to

message_type.description: Message type (status_update, task_request, collaboration, broadcast, system, error)

priority.description: Message priority (low, normal, high, urgent) - default: normal

broadcast_message_to_agents.description: Send a message to all active agents in the system.

get_agent_messages.description: Get messages from an agent's mailbox for processing.

agent_id.description: Agent ID to get messages for (default: manager)

mark_message_as_read.description: Mark a message as read in an agent's mailbox.

message_id.description: ID of message to mark as read

agent_id.description: Agent ID whose mailbox to update (default: manager)

send_status_update_to_manager.description: Send a status update from an agent to the manager about task progress.

agent_id.description: ID of the agent sending the update

tool_calls_summary.description: List of tool names called in this round

current_task_description.description: Description of current task being worked on

error_message.description: Error message if any error occurred

send_message_to_manager.description: Send a message from an agent to the manager.

message_content.description: Content of the message to send

get_agent_session_info.description: Get comprehensive information about current agent session including session statistics and agent details.

list_active_agents.description: Get a list of currently active (running) agents with their details and status.

debug_thread_status.description: Get debug information about thread status for troubleshooting agent execution.
